title: Breaking: Budget announcement - Opportunity emerging
content:
Can't ignore this anymore:

Current situation: Markets traded sideways today with mixed global cues

Contrary to popular belief,


Key metrics:
• Nifty: 24,712 (-0.75%)
• FII: -892 Cr, DII: +3,456 Cr
• VIX: 14.5 (unchanged)

Range-bound movement suggests accumulation phase

What this means:
Good time to build positions gradually

Thoughts?
